game.name: Defense Collapse
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Defense Collapse is a strategy game set in a medieval fantasy world. Pioneer the unexplored dark forest, build your town and defenses, and hold out against the massive hordes of enemies. How long can you survive?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Defense Collapse is a strategy game set in a medieval fantasy world. Pioneer the unexplored dark forest, build your town and defenses, and hold out against the massive hordes of enemies. How long can you survive?
